name: d-fan
description:
Textures were AI generated, felt I should say.

Also the background has nothing to do with this. 

Is 64 bit. A simple demo, with two NPCs, they were made to test dialogue and combat. There is also a sign with nothing of importance written on it. Most of the controls are displayed within "<>", the exceptions being: 

Left-Click (Interact) & Escape (Quit)

If you have any suggestions or questions, I am listening.
